es.uneatlantico.gdbd.dataaccess

Interface IDatabase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MSSQLServerDatabase, MySQLDatabase, OracleDatabase, PostgreSQLDatabase

    public interface IDatabase
    Author:
    Alberto Gutiérrez Arroyo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Column> getColumns(java.lang.String tableName)
      Obtains the columns of the given table
      java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      Obtains the connection to the database
      Database getDatabaseInformation()
      Obtains the name of the tables and the columns of each table

      Obtains a list with the databases on this server

      java.util.List<Table> getTables()

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Obtains the connection to the database
        Returns:
        the connection to the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the database can't be reached

      • setName

        boolean setName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name for the database.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the database
        Returns:
        True if a database with that name exists on that server False if a database with that name doesn't exists on that server

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Getter for the database. It should return the name of the database to work with from this server
        Returns:
        the current selected database on the server

      • getTables

        java.util.List<Table> getTables()
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Obtains the name of the tables on the given database
        Returns:
        the name of the tables of the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if it is not possible to get the tables of the selected database

      • getColumns

        java.util.List<Column> getColumns(java.lang.String tableName)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Obtains the columns of the given table
        Parameters:
        tableName - name of the table from which to retrieve the columns
        Returns:
        a list with the names of the columns of the selected database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if it isn't possible to obtain the columns

      • getDatabaseInformation

        Database getDatabaseInformation()
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Obtains the name of the tables and the columns of each table
        Returns:
        a Database entity with all the information of the current database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if it isn't possible to get the database information

      • getDatabasesOnThisServer

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDatabasesOnThisServer()
                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Obtains a list with the databases on this server
        Returns:
        a list with the databases on the server
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the databases can't be obtained
